plot: Your parents always said you should eat your vegetables. But they were wrong.
title: The Carrot King: A Fable For Children Who Eat Their Vegetables

original_name: The Carrot King: A Fable For Children Who Eat Their Vegetables
plot_en: Your parents always said you should eat your vegetables. But they were wrong.
